snippet.title: Dashavatar | Narci | Bhuvan Sharma (Prod. By Ezik)
snippet.description:
Song: Dashavatar
Rap Artist: Narci 
Singer: Bhuvan Sharma
Lyrics: Narci (Excluding Shree Hari Stotram)
Concept: Narci
Arrangement: Narci
Music: Ezik
Mixing & Mastering: Ezik
Poster: I Kill Graphix 
Video Concept & Direction: Aasheesh Kashyap
Editor & Colourist: Aasheesh Kashyap
Assistant Director: Sachin Kotal
Kathak Dancer: Nitin Kumar
Choreographer: Nitin Kumar
Production: Suryavanshi Rangmanch Theatre Group & Nand Sweets, Sector 7-C, Chandigarh. 

LYRICS- https://genius.com/Narci-dashavatar-lyrics

STREAM/PURCHASE FULL SONG ON
Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/track/7cEbOdPHth4Ca2Qejq55if?si=0CtxK4JGQaKdCbzXAX1qZg
Apple Music- https://music.apple.com/in/album/dashavatar-single/1537123685
JioSaavn: https://www.jiosaavn.com/song/dashavatar/JzdcXQ5VY1o
Wynk: https://wynk.in/music/song/dashavatar/bl_A10320WT036360915H
Hungama: https://www.hungama.com/album/dashavatar/59337116/


SPECIAL THANKS
• Singh DJ brothers, sector 8-C, Chandigarh.
• Yogesh Lukas aka Vampire (dancer, rapper & lyricist) from Kalamdhaari Crew.

ABOUT SONG
We are all familiar with the 10 incarnations of Lord Vishnu (known as Dashavatar). When there has been loss of unrighteousness, then Lord Vishnu has saved this earth from the unrighteous by taking an avatar in every age. Through this song, I have described every incarnation of Lord Vishnu in a concise manner. This is a small and beautiful effort to show the ten avatars which will hopefully touch your hearts.

DASHAVATAR
The Dashavatar refers to the ten primary incarnations (avatars) of Vishnu, the Hindu God of preservation which has Rigvedic origins. Vishnu is said to descend in the form of an avatar to restore cosmic order. The word Dashavatara derives from daśa, meaning 'ten', and avatar (avatāra), roughly equivalent to 'incarnation'. The most popular ten avatars based on many puranas are Matsya, Kurma, Varaha, Narasimha, Vamana, Parashurama, Rama, Krishna, Buddha, and Kalki.

INSTAGRAM
Narci: narci_thoughts
Ezik: being_ezik
Bhuvan Sharma: sharma_bhuvan
Aasheesh Kashyap: aasheesh.k
Sachin Kotal: sachin_kotal
Nitin Kumar: kathakarnitin
Yogesh aka Vampire: yogesh_the.bowcrew
Aaryan Kashyap: aaryankashyapp
Rohit Singh: rohit_7621
Suryavanshi Rangmanch: suryavanshi_rangmanch

#Dashavatar #Narci #BhuvanSharma #Ezik
